Name: Hollow 2
About the game: SHAKHTER-ONE Horrors wake up once again on board Shakhter-One. The history of Mark's mental tragedy and family life comes clearer with every minute spent on this hollowed spaceship. The curse of a never-ending loop can only be stopped by one thing – the truth. But all the secrets are kept jealously by these dark corridors blended with Mark's memories. BREAK THE CYCLE In Hollow 2, exploring and surviving won't be enough to learn your past and unravel all secrets. With re-designed, fast, and friendly mechanics, your mission is to purge an abandoned station in order to reach your goal. Use all weapons and tools you find to make sure that not even a single creature can stand between you and the truth. Run, fight, hide, explore – do your best to destroy the Shakhter-One once and forever!
